review_1: This is a great way to start your day. It's the perfect exercise for me and if I need an extra challenge, I'll play a different one since there are many to choose from Challengebox, not to forget the great music pack selection they have. Overall, I would recommend this fitness program to everyone with a 5-star rating
review_2: Great if your looking for something to help you workout without breaking the bank game runs smoothly and the multiplayer feature is great
review_3: It‚Äôs a amazing game. I played it for a while and then it froze on the loading screen one day so I wrote a review and they responded, they helped me fix the problem.
review_4: Really good for excercise, played for an hour tired af, then took a very long nap
review_5: **2nd Edit - Dev was super helpful and now it works :-) I will be adding this to my roster of work-out apps! *Edit - Developer reached out and is trying to help. It wont load after I start it...waited 10 minutes, uninstalled and reinstalled.
